General.Name: GAMSUNG Corporation Co. Ltd
General.Description: GAMSUNG Corporation Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the mobile peripheral business. It offers outdoor apparels under the Snowpeak brand name; and mobile peripherals under the Actimon brand name. The company was formerly known as Virtualtek Corp. and changed its name to GAMSUNG Corporation Co., Ltd. in April 2021. GAMSUNG Corporation Co., Ltd. was founded in 1991 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
